title: Gianluca Vialli
summary: Gianluca Vialli Commendatore OMRI (Italian pronunciation: [dʒanˈluːka ˈvjalli, viˈa-]; born 9 July 1964) is an Italian former football manager and player who played as a striker. Since retiring, he has gone into management, punditry and worked previously as a commentator for Sky Sport Italia.[3] He is currently part of the Italy national football team non-playing staff as a delegation chief.
